snippet: A plan by the European Union to overhaul bank supervision and help troubled lenders hit a roadblock at a meeting of finance ministers.
abstract: European Union plan to overhaul bank supervision and help troubled lenders hits a roadblock at meeting of finance ministers; stalemate is a reminder that pushing 27 member states to cooperate remains a challenge, even when they have already pledged reforms aimed at ending their three-year debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: A plan by the European Union to overhaul bank supervision and help troubled lenders hit a roadblock at a meeting of finance ministers.

headline.seo: European Bank Overhaul Meets Opposition From Finance Ministers
headline.main: European Bank Overhaul Meets Opposition From Finance Ministers
headline.print_headline: Bank Reform Hits Obstacle In Euro Zone
